description: Details of Drainage pursuant to condition 28 of planning permission 221663VAR dated 17.04.2023 pursuant to 190584OUT dated 28/01/2020 for: Outline planning application for the erection of a four storey building for a mixed-use development (following demolition of existing temporary buildings) comprising 490 sqm of floorspace for ground floor retail units (Use Class A1/ A2); 1,519sqm of floorspace at first and second floor level for community use (Use Class D1); and  286 sqm of floorspace at third floor level for 2 x 3 bed self-contained residential units (Use Class C3) (Details of Access, Layout and Scale considered; Appearance and Landscaping reserved)
application_type_full: Approval of details reserved by a condition (discharge)
